title: Jake Carter and the Nightmare Gallery
description: When 6th grade outcast Jake Carter meets the enigmatic Dr. Shade, his dreams become reality. Shade's miraculous technology grants access to the mental realm of the dreamscape, where anything is possible. Furthermore, Jake discovers that his long lost twin brother Luke has been serving as Shade's loyal protégé for the past seven years. Yet Jake and Luke's reunion is soured by the doctor's nightmarish agenda. Soon, protecting the world of sleeping innocents takes Jake on an adventure past the boundaries of imagination.
author: Kevin M. Folliard
